entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog Patches, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 04:51 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Fog Patches
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow near noon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
